context_blocks.name: What VIB3+ Is
context_blocks.content:
# What VIB3+ Is

VIB3+ is a **shader-based visualization engine** for web pages. It creates animated backgrounds using WebGL shaders.

## It Creates
- Landing page animated backgrounds
- Portfolio site effects
- Music visualizers (audio-reactive)
- Interactive art

## Three Working Systems
| Key | System | Style |
|-----|--------|-------|
| 1 | Faceted | 2D geometric patterns |
| 2 | Quantum | 3D lattice/velocity effects |
| 3 | Holographic | Audio-reactive shimmers |

**Key 4 (Polychora) exists in UI but is a placeholder - not functional.**

## Shared Architecture
All systems share:
- Same 24 geometries (8 base × 3 core)
- Same 6D rotation parameters
- Same color/visual parameters
- Same API functions

## Live Demo
https://domusgpt.github.io/vib3-plus-engine/

context_blocks.name: Geometry System
context_blocks.content:
# VIB3+ Geometry System

All systems (faceted, quantum, holographic) share the same 24 geometries.

## Formula
`geometry = coreIndex * 8 + baseIndex`

## 8 Base Geometries
| Index | Name | Shortcut |
|-------|------|----------|
| 0 | Tetrahedron | Alt+Q |
| 1 | Hypercube | Alt+W |
| 2 | Sphere | Alt+E |
| 3 | Torus | Alt+R |
| 4 | Klein Bottle | Alt+A |
| 5 | Fractal | Alt+S |
| 6 | Wave | Alt+D |
| 7 | Crystal | Alt+F |

## 3 Core Warps
| Core | ×8 | Range | Shortcut |
|------|-----|-------|----------|
| Base | 0 | 0-7 | Alt+1 |
| Hypersphere | 8 | 8-15 | Alt+2 |
| Hypertetra | 16 | 16-23 | Alt+3 |

## Examples
- Torus base: `0×8 + 3 = 3`
- Torus + hypersphere: `1×8 + 3 = 11`
- Torus + hypertetra: `2×8 + 3 = 19`

## API
```javascript
window.selectGeometry(11);
```

## Navigation
- Arrow keys ←/→ cycle through 0-23
- Arrow keys ↑/↓ cycle systems

context_blocks.name: JavaScript API
context_blocks.content:
# VIB3+ JavaScript API

All functions are on `window.*`:

## Core Functions
```javascript
// Switch system
window.switchSystem('holographic')  // 'faceted', 'quantum', 'holographic', 'polychora'

// Select geometry (0-23)
window.selectGeometry(11)

// Update parameter
window.updateParameter('hue', 280)
window.updateParameter('speed', 1.5)
window.updateParameter('rot4dXW', 3.14)

// Randomize / Reset
window.randomizeAll()
window.resetAll()
```

## Parameters
| Parameter | Range | Default |
|-----------|-------|--------|
| hue | 0-360 | 200 |
| saturation | 0-1 | 0.8 |
| intensity | 0-1 | 0.5 |
| gridDensity | 5-100 | 15 |
| morphFactor | 0-2 | 1.0 |
| chaos | 0-1 | 0.2 |
| speed | 0.1-3 | 1.0 |
| rot4dXY/XZ/YZ/XW/YW/ZW | -6.28 to 6.28 | 0 |

## Toggles
```javascript
window.toggleAudio()           // Audio reactivity
window.toggleDeviceTilt()      // 4D device rotation
window.toggleInteractivity()   // Mouse interaction
```

## Gallery
```javascript
window.saveToGallery()
window.openGallery()
```

# VIB3+ Parameters Reference

All systems share the same parameter set.

## 6D Rotation (radians: -6.28 to 6.28)
| Parameter | Rotation Plane |
|-----------|----------------|
| rot4dXY | X-Y plane |
| rot4dXZ | X-Z plane |
| rot4dYZ | Y-Z plane |
| rot4dXW | X-W hyperspace |
| rot4dYW | Y-W hyperspace |
| rot4dZW | Z-W hyperspace |

## Visual Parameters
| Parameter | Range | Default |
|-----------|-------|--------|
| gridDensity | 5-100 | 15 |
| morphFactor | 0-2 | 1.0 |
| chaos | 0-1 | 0.2 |
| speed | 0.1-3 | 1.0 |

## Color Parameters
| Parameter | Range | Default |
|-----------|-------|--------|
| hue | 0-360 | 200 |
| saturation | 0-1 | 0.8 |
| intensity | 0-1 | 0.5 |

## Usage
```javascript
window.updateParameter('paramName', value);
```

## Note
These are the core documented parameters. The system may accept additional parameters - experiment with the UI sliders and inspect window.userParameterState to discover more.

context_blocks.name: Audio Reactivity
context_blocks.content:
# VIB3+ Audio Reactivity

Holographic system is optimized for audio, but all systems support it.

## Enable Audio
```javascript
window.toggleAudio();  // Toggle on/off
```
Or press `A` key.

## Three Frequency Bands
| Band | Frequency | Default Sensitivity |
|------|-----------|--------------------|
| LOW | Bass | 30% |
| MID | Mids | 100% |
| HIGH | Treble | 200% |

## What Audio Affects
Each band can independently control:
- Color (hue shifts)
- Geometry (shape morphing)
- Movement (rotation speed)

## API
```javascript
// Toggle audio reactivity per band/effect
window.toggleAudioReactivity('bass', 'intensity', true);
window.toggleAudioReactivity('mid', 'rotation', true);
window.toggleAudioReactivity('high', 'color', true);
```

## Music Visualizer Setup
```javascript
window.switchSystem('holographic');
window.toggleAudio();
// Bass drives intensity, mids drive rotation
window.toggleAudioReactivity('bass', 'intensity', true);
window.toggleAudioReactivity('mid', 'rotation', true);
```

context_blocks.name: State & Debugging
context_blocks.content:
# VIB3+ State & Debugging

## Global State Objects
```javascript
window.currentSystem        // 'faceted', 'quantum', 'holographic'
window.userParameterState   // All current parameter values
window.geometries           // Geometry definitions per system
window.moduleReady          // Initialization complete flag
```

## Inspect Current State
```javascript
// Get all reactivity settings
window.getCurrentReactivityState()
// Returns: {system, mouse, click, scroll, audio, interactivity, deviceTilt}

// See all parameters
console.log(window.userParameterState);
```

## Canvas Layer IDs
Each system has its own layer container:
- `#vib34dLayers` (faceted)
- `#quantumLayers` (quantum)
- `#holographicLayers` (holographic)
- `#polychoraLayers` (polychora - placeholder)

## Performance Stats
Press `P` to show FPS, frame time, memory, draw calls.
Press `M` to cycle quality modes (Auto/Low/Medium/High/Ultra).

## Discover More Parameters
The documented parameters are the core set. To find additional parameters:
1. Open browser DevTools
2. Inspect `window.userParameterState`
3. Watch for changes as you use UI sliders
4. Experiment with `window.updateParameter('name', value)`

context_blocks.name: Mouse & Touch Interactivity
context_blocks.content:
# VIB3+ Interactivity

## Enable Interactivity
```javascript
window.toggleInteractivity();  // Opens menu
```
Or press `I` key.

## Reactivity Types
Each system can respond to:
- **Mouse** - Cursor position affects rotation
- **Click** - Clicks trigger effects
- **Scroll** - Scroll wheel affects parameters

## API
```javascript
// Toggle per-system reactivity
window.toggleSystemReactivity('quantum', 'mouse', true);
window.toggleSystemReactivity('holographic', 'click', true);
window.toggleSystemReactivity('faceted', 'scroll', true);
```

## Device Tilt (Mobile)
```javascript
window.toggleDeviceTilt();  // 4D rotation from device orientation
```
Or press `T` key.

## Mouse-Reactive Background Example
```javascript
window.switchSystem('quantum');
window.selectGeometry(3);
window.toggleSystemReactivity('quantum', 'mouse', true);
```
